{"id":1404244733,"question_id":190,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 months, 1 week","timestamp":1727463705,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1404244733/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Bits","memory":"7.6 MB","code":"//Reverse bits of a given 32 bits unsigned integer.\n//The input must be a binary string of length 32\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    uint32_t reverseBits(uint32_t n) {\n        vector<int> bits(32,0);\n        for(int i=0; i<16; i++) {\n            bits[31-i] =  (n >> i)&1; //low\n            bits[i] =  (n >> (31-i))&1; //high\n        };\n\n        uint32_t ret = 0;\n        for(int i=0; i<32; i++)\n            ret += bits[i] << i;\n        return ret; \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-bits","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
